mapper.insert: insert into board values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, #{nickname}, default, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select board.*, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rn from board) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select board.*, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rn from board where ${select} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from board where ${select} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update board set view_count = view_count+1 where seq = #{seq}
update board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select seq from member where nickname = #{value}
